column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////What can i say...this place is fantastic!  Came here on a Thursday night with the bf.  We wanted to grab a nice cocktail and I suggested Bavettes and I'm sure glad i did.  Not too crowded but not empty either.  Place is dark
column2: sexy and surprisingly large.   If Au Cheval is the mid twenties fun younger brother
column3: then Bavette's is its more sophisticated
